'''2.2.10271''' ({{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}}), '''2.2.10272''' ({{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}}, via the {{w|Microsoft Store}}/{{W|Xbox (app)|Xbox app}}), '''2.2.10274''' ({{w|macOS}}), or '''2.2.10273''' ({{w|Linux}}), is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on February 7, 2022.

== Changes ==
* Fixed some links from the Launcher which were pointing to the wrong places.
* Updated textures of the ore icons in Installation screen.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed some user launch issues, crashes, and other critical bugs.
* {{bug|MCL-13519}} - Launcher fails to launch game and then incorrectly claims that the game is already running.
* {{bug|MCL-17983}} - Outdated ore textures in installation icon dropdown.
* {{bug|MCL-21061}} - Instead of using saved password users now have to enter two passwords.</onlyinclude>
